This technique is an advanced version of the Shadow Imitation Technique, where the user expands their shadow to cover a wide range, thereby reducing the chance of escape. Due to the technique's concept, multiple targets can be captured simultaneously. 

== Trivia ==
* [[Shikamaru Nara]] gives [[Temari]] credit for making this advancement to his clan's ability.<ref>''Boruto: Naruto the Movie'' light novel</ref>
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', this technique is referred to as the {{translation|"[[Shadow Bind Technique]]"|影縛りの術|Kageshibari no Jutsu}}, despite it being stated to be a separate, advanced version of said technique in other forms of media.
